item.title: Minneapolis protesters march against ICE as governor urges Trump to remove agents
item.description: Second fatal shooting an ‘inflection point’ says Tim Walz as protests spread over Saturday’s shooting of intensive care nurse Alex Pretti in Minneapolis.

item.title: Republican governor believes Trump is getting 'bad advice' on immigration amid outrage over MN shooting
item.description: Oklahoma Gov. Kevin Stitt disagrees with President Donald Trump's immigration policies after the deadly shooting of Alex Pretti in Minneapolis on Saturday.
